intro: Psychotria neurothricha, commonly known as the velvetleaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its dark green, velvety leaves and small, clustered white flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains several seeds, which are dispersed by wind or animals. Psychotria neurothricha is often found in lowland rainforests and is adapted to nutrient-poor soils.
